leshy:WoodcarverRelic.NAME: Woodcarver Mask

Pick a creature to gain the Squirrel tribe.

leshy:CloverRelic.NAME: Clover
leshy:CloverRelic.FLAVOR: You must not like the cards I have given you.
DESCRIPTIONS: On right click, reroll your combat rewards or chest contents. Usable 3 times.

leshy:DogTreatRelic.NAME: Dog Treat
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random creatures.

leshy:BoulderRelic.NAME: Boulder
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if your creatures have less than
current Health, summon a Boulder with the difference.

leshy:ChickenEggRelic.NAME: Chicken Egg
leshy:ChickenEggRelic.FLAVOR: What came first, the chicken or the pointless question?

leshy:BloodstoneRelic.NAME: Bloodstone
leshy:BloodstoneRelic.FLAVOR: For when Squirrels put down their acorns and go to war.

leshy:TinyHeadbandRelic.NAME: Tiny Headband

leshy:PaintbrushRelic.NAME: Paintbrush
